Serialized Form

  • Package NumberConverterSystem.Models

    • Class NumberConverterSystem.Models.Conversion

      class Conversion extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      2L

      • Serialized Fields

        • errorMessage
          String errorMessage
          The error message generated during the conversion, if any.

          If the conversion fails due to invalid input, unsupported base, or other errors, this field contains a descriptive error message. If the conversion succeeds, this field is empty.

          Example: "Invalid input for base 2"
        • inputValue
          String inputValue
          The string representation of the value to be converted.

          This is the raw input provided by the user, in the format appropriate for the Conversion.sourceBase.

          Example: "101" (binary), "A3" (hexadecimal)
        • result
          String result
          The result of the conversion operation.

          This field is set after a successful conversion. If the conversion fails, this field remains empty.

          Example: "5" (decimal), "101" (binary)
        • sourceBase
          int sourceBase
          The base in which the Conversion.inputValue is represented.

          This integer specifies the source base for the conversion (e.g., 2 for binary, 10 for decimal).

        • targetBase
          int targetBase
          The base to which the Conversion.inputValue should be converted.

          This integer specifies the target base for the conversion (e.g., 10 for decimal, 16 for hexadecimal).

    • Class NumberConverterSystem.Models.User

      class User extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • conversionHistory
          HashMap<LocalDate,ArrayList<Conversion>> conversionHistory
          The historical record of all conversions performed by the user, grouped by date.

          This map associates each LocalDate with a list of Conversion objects performed on that date, enabling detailed tracking and reporting of user activity over time.

          Example: {2025-08-26=[Conversion1, Conversion2], 2025-08-27=[Conversion3]}
        • currentSessionConversions
          ArrayList<Conversion> currentSessionConversions
          The list of Conversion objects representing all conversions performed in the current session.

          This list is cleared when session data is saved to history or when a new session begins.

        • id
          int id
          The unique integer identifier for the user.

          This ID is assigned at user creation and is used for efficient lookup and authentication.

          Example: 1, 42, 1001
        • password
          String password
          The password associated with the user account.

          This string is used for user authentication. It should be stored securely in production systems.

          Example: "password123"
        • undoCountInCurrentSession
          int undoCountInCurrentSession
          The number of undo operations performed by the user in the current session.

          This integer is incremented each time the user undoes a conversion during the session.

          Example: 0, 2, 5
        • username
          String username
          The username associated with the user account.

          This string is used for user authentication and display purposes.

          Example: "alice", "bob"
